posting_body: ['Apartment Rental Experts', '2 Bedroom and 1 Bath in Somerville / Davis Square $2,850', 'Somerville / Davis Square / Davis Square', 'Available:', '9/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#130078', 'Apartment Summary', '2 bedroom smack dab in middle of Davis Square!', 'Hardwood floors throughout.', 'The apartment has plenty of windows and gets amazing natural light.', 'There is a laundry room  in the basement.', 'Unlike most buildings in the area this unit has an eat-in-kitchen.', 'Come look at the best building in Davis SQ and live 30 seconds away from the red-line!', '   (Reference #130078)', 'Apartment Details', 'Location:', 'Somerville/Davis Square', 'Bath:', '1', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Reference:', '#130078', 'Available:', 'September 01, 2022', 'Call the office @ 617-684-8000', 'Email : Hit Reply top left', 'Contact Information', 'Call:', '617.684.8000', 'Please mention reference #', '130078', '* Availability, fee and monthly rent are subject to change.', ' Please call to verify details.', '** Pictures are of model unit, and furnished appliances may vary.', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
